law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 575, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 229, sec. 1, effective January 1, 2001. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 276, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 217, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 1, effective June 16, 1960.
